Reviews.Title: What you need to connect two cables
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Adams "mja"
Reviews.Content: I needed these to allow me to connect two of the power/video cables for my surveillance system. One 60 foot was not long enough, so using these allowed me to connect another cable to extend it. You don't need anything for the power side of the cable, it just plugs in with the existing connectors whereas the video side needs these adapters. Work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Coupler
Reviews.Author: Kwalsh
Reviews.Content: Looked around everywhere for these couplers .amazon was the only place that had them readily available .only downside was i needed them quick, so I used next day air.20 dollars for a 5 dollar product.i guess when you are in a hurry that's what happens.Oh yeh they worked great with no video loss!

Reviews.Title: Great price and made well
Reviews.Author: El Sparquito "EL SPARQUITO"
Reviews.Content: I bought these to couple oscilloscope extension cables to probe leads.  They work well and do not skew the data.  Good deal.

Reviews.Title: right price. right product
Reviews.Author: Marc "Gadgets"
Reviews.Content: perfect for extending many cables that were not long enough. they helped me to save money and run to the store to buy a longer cable...I install cameras for a living...

Reviews.Title: perfect for connecting 2 cables together
Reviews.Author: tracy thomas
Reviews.Content: did the trick, enabled me to install our video cameras from a longer distance.  the cords that came w/ the lorex set we ordered were 60' long, so I was able to use this to connect another 60' cable.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use connectors
Reviews.Author: David Bushek
Reviews.Content: These connectors are easy to use.They are simple to hook up.Good product for the price.If I need more I will buy again.

Reviews.Title: really good quality
Reviews.Author: Zhen Feng Tan
Reviews.Content: I really like this item, because it has really good quality. Overall, i am happy with the result. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: quality is good, does what it is supposed to...
Reviews.Author: bgoff_ak
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried about the cost VS the quality. I was happy when they arrived and they have worked well in my CCTV applications. i would not hesitate to purchase more ( Just did a few days ago ). no real negatives to post what you see is what you get...

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the coupling of cables
Reviews.Author: ccc
Reviews.Content: These can extend a cable the proper way.  Don't go twisting the inner and outer conductor, then taping it with electrical tape or much worse masking or scotch tape.  Do the job right and just order these!!

Reviews.Title: Such a deal!
Reviews.Author: Tebowned
Reviews.Content: Great quality and have not had any issues using these. Purchased 200 units and very happy with them, no issues at all.

Reviews.Title: Job expediter
Reviews.Author: Cuffy
Reviews.Content: Working with pre-terminated video cable (video wire with plugs/connectors already installed on it) these BNC F to F couplers are a must when connecting one wire to the next eliminating the need of wire surgery.  Solid and positive mechanical and signal connection is made.  I found these difficult to find at local electronics shops.

Reviews.Title: They Work to Connect Two BNC Cables
Reviews.Author: BP
Reviews.Content: They're BNC connectors, hard to find a lot to write about them, they simply connect two BNC cables together.  They work, they're solid, if you need BNC connectors buy them.

Reviews.Title: Poor fit
Reviews.Author: Josh L.
Reviews.Content: Cheap might not be the way to go with bnc couplers. Only 4 out of the 10 fit. The rest are too big. You would have to hammer them into the male plug. One might be able to grind off a bit of material to get these to work properly?

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: No loss even with 300 foot plus cable, works fine and good constructionWill be buying more in the future

Reviews.Title: Made well
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: A simple product with a specific purpose: to join the ends of 2 male BNC connectors together. Works fine, should last "forever", and well priced on Amazon

Reviews.Title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Terri Wallace
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed with the equipment they have sent me. Very nice and durable. Way better than stores. I just want to say to Amazon and vendors you are the best when it comes to high quality. I was very happy and I never have any negative reviews because, it is just impressive!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great value and works fine
Reviews.Author: Sir Lion
Reviews.Content: All pieces worked fine.  Good value and free shipping.  No complaints at all on this items, 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: worked just fine
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: I was installing a home business camera system. I needed to add some extra cable, and needed an adapter that I couldn't get at the local Radio Shack....this adapter worked just fine for the application!

Reviews.Title: Seller issued full refund w/o return of wrong parts.
Reviews.Author: Rich A
Reviews.Content: I recieved 1 QTY 10X - RG59 Coaxial Cable 90 Degree Angle Male to Female Adapters. I have no use for these parts. The address label description: 1 QTY 10X BNC - BNC 900057 A, but that's not what was inside. The price was great, and delivery was fast. I would use this seller again. They issued a FULL REFUND and didn't waste time & money returning the wrong parts. Although, I still need the: BNC Female-Female Coupler adapters.

Reviews.Title: Simple connectors
Reviews.Author: Nealp
Reviews.Content: Work as expected and look like good quality.Comes packaged nicely. Not much else I can say about these connectors.Overall happy with them.

Reviews.Title: Some Couplers needed replacement
Reviews.Author: Kevin Seaton
Reviews.Content: Three of the couplers went bad after a few months of use. After I replaced the coupler, the video feed came up again. May have been a bad batch. More than 75% of them are still working without replacement, but three have gone bad and needed replacement.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: this little adapter does what it should be, and it has good quailty. I will recommend it to all friends.

Reviews.Title: Good product and price
Reviews.Author: Avery
Reviews.Content: Only needed one for a security camera setup (needed to connect two cables for a long extension) but purchased the pack of ten for the price of one elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: could be better
Reviews.Author: Oddi S. Diaz
Reviews.Content: This product is very well done. The only problem was that the center connector is too narrow and the pin is hard to enter.

Reviews.Title: not bad
Reviews.Author: treymoney
Reviews.Content: it does the job it intended to do. very useful when needed for connecting cable together. I would recommended this product

Reviews.Title: coupler
Reviews.Author: Thomas Crews
Reviews.Content: Had to connect  power cord and needed additional cord the one that came with unit wasn't long enough. Worked out great would order from again.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected!
Reviews.Author: Chris Latham
Reviews.Content: Product works as expected. Joined two cables together to connect a camera for my video surveillance system and it works great!

Reviews.Title: adapters
Reviews.Author: Mike Horanic
Reviews.Content: These bnc adapters arrived in a timely manner and were as ordered. I would definitely recommend these to anyone who is running security and needs bnc couplers to do the job.

Reviews.Title: Works as designed
Reviews.Author: Patti
Reviews.Content: Works as designed. I used this to add on CCTV cables to wrap around eve of house. My 100 ft IR cameras work great.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: sammy toke
Reviews.Content: I needed a few of these for my cameras had to put a 150ft and 80ft camera cord together. Worked great and still does!

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: D. S. Johnston ""The Bargain Hunter""
Reviews.Content: I was looking for cables to extend the length of my existing cables and these worked great to link them together.  Cant beat the price either.  Recommended!

Reviews.Title: BNC
Reviews.Author: Mo-z
Reviews.Content: Bought these for a security system that did not work properly and was worth returning these. cannot say how they work as I have nothing to use them with.

Reviews.Title: Slow shipping
Reviews.Author: H. S. Wylie "hswylie"
Reviews.Content: Item ended up having to be shipped from China. Shipping required much longer than expected. On a smalI item like this one would think the seller would have it in stock. have not been able to use the connectors because the cable which was ordered from a different company was sent to an incorrect address. The price for the connectors was excellent. I'm sure they will work if I ever get additional cable.

Reviews.Title: seams ok
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I just recived them today, seam ok and I must admit the service was great and fast del.i will buy more

Reviews.Title: Helpful for long distances
Reviews.Author: MamaHam
Reviews.Content: This was good to buy to go along with the extra feet of cords to go with the cameras that I bought for surveillance around the house.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: I used these in my cctv for extensions to join 2 60ft cables and they fit great and worked fine.

Reviews.Title: High Quality Adapters
Reviews.Author: Casteela
Reviews.Content: These adapters come with 10 to a packs.  The adapters allows you to plug in to sections of wire. Good quality adapters.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Worked perfect joining two cables. Nothing more to say. Does what it's supposed to! I snapped them together and wrapped in electricial tape.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: I need connector to run my camera to the backyard.This was what I was looking for. It's working. The picture quality doesn't change much with this long cable.

Reviews.Title: I Only Used One
Reviews.Author: MWCraft
Reviews.Content: I bought this at the same time as my Swann SWDVK-825504 system since I did not know how long a cable run I would need to install my cameras.  Fortunately, the VideoSecu 150 ft cables were more than enough for my home and able to bridge the distance from camera to DVR.The Swann system came with 60 ft cables so, I used one of these adaptors on two of these cables just to see if it worked.  Then I ran the combined cable from the garage to my living room (with the cable lying on the floor) and connected it to the t.v. to verify functionality.  Everything worked as expected.The 60 ft cable was long enough for the cameras on my first story so, I ended up not using the coupler adapters when I ran the cables through the walls/ceiling.

Reviews.Title: BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: These couplers arrived within the said receiving date and are what I needed.  They fit new and old RG59 Cables.

Reviews.Title: Missing three
Reviews.Author: rjb77
Reviews.Content: Pack of 10 were ordered but when it was delivered almost FOUR weeks later, the package was ripped open and poorly taped back together but it was missing 3 adapters.  At the price, I don't care but four weeks???  I realized that AFTER the order was placed so I got what I needed at Radio Shack.  I'm sure I'll use these somewhere in the future.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!!!
Reviews.Author: John Carlesi
Reviews.Content: Radio shack stated they would not work for my application...They were WRONG. Worked perfectly as I expected....This was a great deal

Reviews.Title: These work great
Reviews.Author: Nathan Johnson
Reviews.Content: I used these to connect extra 50ft cables to the 60ft cables that came with my Zmodo camera system. They work great. I didn't notice any quality loss either. It's better to buy them in packs of 10 like this rather than individually because although I don't need 10 of them, it's much cheaper to buy them like this (I paid just under $4 for these) and if I ever do need more someday I have extra ones.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I recommended For every oneThe price is very good

Reviews.Title: It works but looks and feels cheap
Reviews.Author: i-review "Massis"
Reviews.Content: I used these couplers to extend the cables in my DVR security system.  These couplers look and feel very cheap but they do work well.

Reviews.Title: They work well
Reviews.Author: Giovanny Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I have no issues and it's been months since I hooked up a 100ft cord to an existing 60ft cord.  All my 8 channels are working great.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Bought it . Didnt need it
Reviews.Author: Jack strickland
Reviews.Content: I bought it but didn't need it, but I have them if I do , Gave some to my installer buddy , he needed them as well as some of the excess cables for his system

Reviews.Title: They work
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Only used a couple but they work as well as need to.  I have used to run longer lines than the manufactured lines and there does not appear to be any quality loss!!!

Reviews.Title: neat little time savers
Reviews.Author: preybird1
Reviews.Content: These worked very well and are reasonable in price. I almost got bnc to bnc cables but then you are stuck with cables that only work female to female.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: G. Rodrigues
Reviews.Content: I matched these up with the Night Owl security system that I have. They allowed me to terminate the power cable in my garage and attach a new wire so it would extend the video into the house.

Reviews.Title: Great parts, fast service
Reviews.Author: Gary Vukovic
Reviews.Content: This is like rating the quality of stop signs on the highway.They all work, and saved my life!Great price and fast service.Yes - I'd recommend them to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Not much to say.
Reviews.Author: D. Jacobowitz
Reviews.Content: These are BNC F-F couplers. They work and appear to be reasonably well-made.And this is where I add pointless words.

Reviews.Title: very nice for this price
Reviews.Author: AUgie the Prospector
Reviews.Content: These appear to be reasonably well made - certainly fit several different BNC male connectors and made good contact.  They've worked OK in a few low-power uses.  No notable deficiencies spotted so far.Considering the very low price, I was pleased with the quality.

Reviews.Title: Coupler for your extension
Reviews.Author: stathis747
Reviews.Content: This is if you buy additional cable to extend your security cameras you will need this coupler.  It does the job very well.

Reviews.Title: nice connector
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Moser "xtremr"
Reviews.Content: connectors were perfect for my application and the price was good.  would buy again if needed.  seems like good build quality too.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Janet A. Akers
Reviews.Content: These worked very well for what we needed them for and they were easy to order and very affordable. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Robert Gault
Reviews.Content: Not a very big purcase, but they still need good feedback. They arrived with the rest of our order and did not get lost in the order. Thanks I really needed them.

Reviews.Title: Adapter
Reviews.Author: Gemini0126
Reviews.Content: This adapter was really useful to extend my security wires.  I could've bought longer wires but they were more expensive.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Powerstrokin
Reviews.Content: they fit good only had to use a couple of them would buy them, again happy with the quality and fit

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Ronald Fowler
Reviews.Content: Best buy anywhere, what can I say does the job as intended, but less that 1/2 the cost of radio shack.

Reviews.Title: Dependable and reliable
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Great price and reliable product.  Quick shipping and convient usage.  I would recommend this product to anyone whom was looking to extend a BNC connection.

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: It's hard to subjectively review this type of product.  It's a connector.  That's it.  But I got 10 of these for what a retailer would charge me for 1 or 2.  It was a great value.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as described
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G Martin
Reviews.Content: They are well made and conveniently packaged.  They work.  Can't ask for anything else. I needed six more words so I added this sentence.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: anthony smith
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this product.  I will definitely buy more of these  for all of my camera jobs.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: jd53
Reviews.Content: I had to move my survalence system and this item sure made it easy.Just connected extensions and I was done.

Reviews.Title: Product works great!
Reviews.Author: A. Judis "ajcctech"
Reviews.Content: The product works great and the delivery was very fast. I would recommend this vendor to others. I am totally satisfied. Thank you Valley Enterprises!

Reviews.Title: Valley BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10
Reviews.Author: DJSFO
Reviews.Content: works fine but take a long time to get from china!! So if you can wait then fine., go for it!

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Used in connecting security camera cables where extensions were needed.  Good product.  Filler words.  Filler words.  Filler words.  Filler words.

Reviews.Title: Sure needed em
Reviews.Author: gma
Reviews.Content: Glad I ordered these we needed em for the additional 100 ft cords we ordered. They came in handy and worked well.

Reviews.Title: Received the product
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Received the product, looks good but have not used yet.  Good value for the price.  It took a little longer than expected to received but I was not in a hurry.

Reviews.Title: BNC Female to Female coupler adapter
Reviews.Author: goarmy
Reviews.Content: This is a wasted additional purchase for the system. Instead of the manufacture making the cables with one female and male end, they manufacture them with two female ends. However the power side of the cable has a male and female end to them. This item does effectively connect two BNC cables together easily though and is not to hard to connect. The seller ships the item quickly and you should have it in just a few days. The seller has reasonable prices and is quick to respond to your purchase. I would purchase again from this seller.

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Clyde Douglas
Reviews.Content: This works the purpose it was made for. The price was really good. I would recommend this for those wanting to make connections

Reviews.Title: Just Works
Reviews.Author: Loren K. Allston "twin66az"
Reviews.Content: Not much to say about these connectors but that they just work. Inexpensive and free ship too !! Can't beat that

Reviews.Title: Connector
Reviews.Author: Joseph Valenta
Reviews.Content: I ordered these for the video survailance system that I was installing on my home.  I needed them for the furthest cameras.  They came from China it too a while but are as goos as the ones from the store

Reviews.Title: What I wanted
Reviews.Author: beardy
Reviews.Content: Had to wait a while --but they are what I wanted for a low price.  Merry Christmas and Happy Newe Year is thay enought words?

Reviews.Title: Good connectors!
Reviews.Author: Arcani
Reviews.Content: These thing work as they should with no problems. Have used these at several locations as extensions for my video DVR systems with no problems. Good product!

Reviews.Title: extend yourself a little
Reviews.Author: DodgeD
Reviews.Content: I bought these to have for my cam systems I  am pleased to get so many for a good price. My friend needed a couple too so I gave him some. They're Great!

Reviews.Title: Handy Gizmos
Reviews.Author: Raymond W. Leung "rwleung98"
Reviews.Content: Need these gizmos to make the video cord longer with the original cable that came with the OEM. With out these I would have to made connection by stripping the wire and solder them together.

Reviews.Title: BNC FEMALE TO FEMALE ADAPTERS
Reviews.Author: lcruse
Reviews.Content: These adapters come in handy if you need to extend your cable or put two together.the price is very good,and i will probably end up losing a few of these,so the 10 pack is the way to go.

Reviews.Title: extend bnc lines
Reviews.Author: Jambo FTCW "Tech Special"
Reviews.Content: needed to connect two bnc lines together for a far reaching camera - seems to be quality made and functions flawlessly

Reviews.Title: BNC Female to Female adapter
Reviews.Author: Altor
Reviews.Content: Not as good a quality as I expected.  They are hard to fit with BNC cables. Their quality leaves something to be desired. Look for a better adapter.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: B. Saetern "College Guy"
Reviews.Content: Item came in as described and worked well without losing any picture quality.  Easy to use and simple to add more.  Will buy more if needed. Great product!

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: It's a coupler. It couples. As long as there is a copper tube with no break from one end to the other, it works.

Reviews.Title: Buy These!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Davis "Suzanne Davis"
Reviews.Content: There connectors are perfect!  I purchased mine from a company in the USA, not from Hong Kong.  I do not know how they are able to sell them so inexpensively!  And with free shipping!  I saw them when I was setting up an eight camera security system for our bowling center.  I thought, "I'll never need those" and didn't buy any.  Of course, when it came time to do the install, I needed a bunch of them!  So, I bought them and they are awesome.  For only thirty-some cents each, you should just have them in your tool box.  Just in case!

Reviews.Title: BNC Female to Female Coupler
Reviews.Author: Joey
Reviews.Content: As a professional CCTV Installer, I have used these adapters in many installations and have had no complaints. They work exactly as advertised and are good quality and price. A+ product.

Reviews.Title: Good product - good price
Reviews.Author: g.bo
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised. I used them to join prefab RG59 Siamese video cables for a security cam network. Seven months of continuous use and no problems! Shipping was the usual quick and efficient AMAZonING way.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Brian Johnson
Reviews.Content: No noticeable video loss and a perfect/tight fit.  I would highly recommend this product if you are buying a video surveillance system.

Reviews.Title: Good device
Reviews.Author: tacmtz
Reviews.Content: Works well for what it is to do.  What else can I say.  It is pretty simple device.  It is hard to write 20 words on this.

Reviews.Title: Just Works! Highly Recommended
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: These BNC couplers worked perfectly for connecting two cables on my Zmodo Surveillance System with 8 Weatherproof IR Cameras PKD-DK0865-NHD to extend my camera distance from the base unit. These are good quality and are fairly good value for the number you get.Highly Recommended!CFH

Reviews.Title: Excellent little BNC coupler!
Reviews.Author: James B
Reviews.Content: What can I say!  It is a tiny, solid metal BNC (British Naval Connector) and it works exactly like it is supposed to.  I used it to join cables on a video surveillance system where I wanted to place a camera some distance from the controller/DVR.  It is exactly what they say it is and it works great!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: renomarine
Reviews.Content: These connectors work perfectly, snug as a bug! low price, no complaints! Received it 3 days early as well! There really isn't too much to say about them oher than that, but i certainly am pleased with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: They are what the are!  You can't beat the price
Reviews.Author: Nylox
Reviews.Content: These BNC couplers work exactly as they should.  The price can't be beat anywhere.  I will do this again if I need more.  This is absolutely the best value that could be found anywhere on the net.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a 10 pack, does the job!
Reviews.Author: J. Eaves "mother of 4"
Reviews.Content: Nothing much to say about these adapters. They do the job of connecting cables together. They work great. Buying in the 10 pack saved money too.

Reviews.Title: does what it does
Reviews.Author: Jason P. Loveless
Reviews.Content: it does what it does,  there all made in china anymore so there is no surprise there but these guys were the cheapest by far and they work.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: j flavors
Reviews.Content: Either the BNC has connections or it doesn't right? The coupler works great and is of good quality. I used these in TV ststion connections, so it has to be of excellent quality. The 10 pk price was excellent.

Reviews.Title: BNC female to female connector
Reviews.Author: Jeff T. Klipp "Jeff K"
Reviews.Content: A well made BNC female to female connector. When extending your male BNC wires you need one of these to connect them together. Bought a 10 pack because they come in handy when you need them & you cant get them in any electronic store.

Reviews.Title: 10 Is more then enough
Reviews.Author: Damian Marynski
Reviews.Content: First I went to the local Radio Shack but they did not have the piece I needed, and the second spot that I started looking for it was Amazon, with the next day option I had the parts the next day. All pieces work fine, the installation runs from house to a house, so the cable is in the air and connected by BNC Female to Female adapters. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice adapters for cables
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I ordered but ended up not using them, but if I ever need them they are there, if I can remember where I put them..

Reviews.Title: exactly what it says it is...
Reviews.Author: Pop ina Bottle "Never argue with an idiot. th...
Reviews.Content: just as described. This did allow me to extend my BNC cables to the encoder after moving the encoder to a different location.

Reviews.Title: Shorter Females Please!
Reviews.Author: Hicoteo
Reviews.Content: These females are hot. They make connecting cables a ball!However, they could be shorter. When you join two cables together with these you end up with a long stiff joint that is hard to get around conduct corners.So, the more petite the better!

Reviews.Title: A simple little BNC adaptor can be a thing of beauty!  With expedited delivery as well.
Reviews.Author: barry lindsay
Reviews.Content: I only needed one of these special (to BNC) Antenna Adapters to connect my external antenna to my brand new police band scanner.  I could not locate one of these anywhere in this 100,000 plus metropolitan area around Warner Robins Air Force base, here in Georgia, USA.  One is all I needed, but I ordered three, simply because it seems so special, and presumed to be difficult to locate.  Amazon.com provided me a source requiring just a few keystrokes on my part.  I was very happy with the <sparkling> appearance of these simple devices.  Delivery was also, very much faster than I had expected, and pricing, very reasonable.  Especially since I only ordered a quantity of three each!I highly recommend to everyone that reads this message and needs a special connector that they send EmBest an inquiry (through Amazon)!  You will be as satisfied as I was, I am sure.

Reviews.Title: SI SIRVE
Reviews.Author: LUIS YAMA
Reviews.Content: BUEN PRODUCTO, EXACTAMENTE PARA LO QUE FUE COMPRADO NOS SIRVIO PARA EL ENLACE CORRESPONDIENTE EN LA INSTALACION DE LAS CAMARAS DE NUESTRO SISTEMA DE VIDEOVIGILANCIA. RECOMENDABLE

Reviews.Title: What a joke, dont order from here
Reviews.Author: mack
Reviews.Content: I placed order for several items May 16th and got everything except this item. I have all my cameras ready, wires pulled and cannot finish work because why, due to incompetence of not getting the smallest item on the list on time.

ProductInfo.Features: BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10
ProductInfo.Name: BNC Female to Female Coupler Adapters Pack of 10
